title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. CC, pt. 8004 - Revocation Process
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. CC, pt. 8004 - Revocation Process

State Regulations
§ 8004.1 - General
§ 8004.2 - Review of Condition Violation, Initial Actions and Case Designation
§ 8004.3 - Report to the Board Required
§ 8004.4 - Notice of Violation, Violation of Release Report
§ 8004.5 - Parole Warrant for Retaking and Temporary Detention
§ 8004.6 - Certain Technical Violations - No Reincarceration
§ 8004.7 - Technical Violations - Reincarceration
§ 8004.8 - Non-technical Violations
§ 8004.9 - Recognizance Hearing
§ 8004.10 - Declaration of Delinquency
§ 8004.11 - Discretionary Cancellation of Revocation Process

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. CC, pt. 8004

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §§ 259[2], 259-b[11], 259-c[11]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
